author: timbeiko
content: So, after the discussions on ACD Friday and the testing call yesterday, I've put this doc together outlining the pros/cons of both approaches. I think we need to decide which way we're going quite soon, and ideally on the CL call later this week, so that we can start planning for the Goerli merge. If I've missed something, please leave a comment on the HackMD. Will also link on the CL call agenda: https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/merge-release-strategy
